RuleSet.Name: initdata/schemaname-secinit-tenant.xml
RuleSet.Descr: Java 25 XML Initialization Data for Tenant

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaSecInitTenantSaxLoaderFile
GenFile.ModuleName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$saxloader

RuleSet.GenFile: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <CFSec xmlns="uri://cfsec/cfsecloader" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:schemaLocation="uri://cfsec/cfsecloader file:/opt/$reference MinorVersion refernce ParentMajVer reference ParentSPrj reference ParentTPrj Name$/$reference MinorVersion reference ParentMajVer Name$.0.$reference MinorVersion Name$/cfsec-structured.xsd" > <Cluster FullDomName="system" Description="system"> <Tenant TenantName="tenant"> <TSecGroup Name="TenantAdmin" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupMember User="system" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Admin" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="TenantAdmin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Reader" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Creator" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Updater" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$SchemaName$Deleter" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup>$iterate SchemaRefs( each SchemaSecInitTenantSaxLoaderFileDeclRefGroupAdmin empty empty )$$iterate SchemaTables( each maybeSchemaSecInitTenantSaxLoaderFileDeclTableGroups empty empty )$ </Tenant> </Cluster> </CFSec>
RuleSet.GenRule: <TSecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="TenantAdmin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Reader" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Creator" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Updater" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Deleter" IsVisible="true" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Admin" /> </TSecGroup>

<TSecGroup Name="Read$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Reader" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="Create$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Creator" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="Update$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Updater" /> </TSecGroup> <TSecGroup Name="Delete$TableName$" IsVisible="false" > <TSecGroupInclude SubGroup="$SchemaNameWhichDefinesTable$Deleter" /> </TSecGroup>
